price: ߣߌ߲߬ ߦߋ߫ ߕߊ ߘߏ߲߬ߞߏ ߟߎ߬ ߟߊ߫ ߢߐ߲߯ ߞߟߍ߫ ߞߊ߲ ߠߋ߬ ߘߌ߫ ߕߎ߬ߢߊ ߟߊ߫ ߘߋ߬
arabic: إِنَّ ذَٰلِكَ لَحَقّٞ تَخَاصُمُ أَهۡلِ ٱلنَّارِ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: inna dhālika laḥaqqun takhāṣumu ahli al-nāri
